NO_EMPLOYEES.TITLE: No Employees Assigned
NO_EMPLOYEES.MESSAGE: Once you've added your employees, assign them to Job Roles at sites and projects by going to
NO_EMPLOYEES.MESSAGE2: The status of all your employee's assignments will be shown in this seciton so you can monitor how they're doing.

NO_ASSIGNMENTS.TITLE: No Assignments
NO_ASSIGNMENTS.MESSAGE: Your employer has not given you any assignments yet.  After you've been assigned to a site, your status will show in this area.
NO_ASSIGNMENTS.MESSAGE2: You can get a head start by adding certificates or other skill proof ahead of time. Just go to
NO_ASSIGNMENTS.MESSAGE3: and upload any certificates (files or photos) you already have. Those uploads can be easily applied to future required skills!

FEEDBACK.TITLE: Tell us what you think!
FEEDBACK.PLACEHOLDER: Let us know what you think or what issues you've found.
FEEDBACK.MESSAGE: Thanks for the heads up! We really appreciate the feedback.
